content: the marshmallow clouds baby blanket is a modern heirloom crochet baby blanket with timeless charm featuring cozy texture and three sweet ruffled edges this design is perfect for gifting at baby showers snuggling little ones or passing down as a cherished keepsake with the pattern pdf you ll get gauge swatch image stitch chart support photos progress tracker instant pattern download 13 pages total from cover to cover professionally tech edited pdf **this pattern pdf has been professionally tech edited by christine @ stitchreader com 1 ** **sizes** 5 total sizes lovey security stroller receiving crib **skill level** easy **recommended yarn** 167 yd 152 m to 3248 yd 2969 m depending on size of project size 3 yarn lion brand comfy cotton blend in whipped cream used in designer s sample **hook** us size h-8 5mm **notions** yarn needles scissors **gauge** 18 sts by 12 row = 4 in 10 cm **finished measurements** 10 in 25 cm x 10 in 25 cm to 36 in 91 cm x 54 in 137 cm depending on sized crocheted **terms to know** chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet front loop only back loop only half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop treble_crochet 1 https //www stitchreader com/
